file.name: test_user.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /users/test_user:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Create test user
      description: This endpoint handles http requests to create a test user
      parameters:
        - name: access_token
          in: query
          description: Access token generated from the seller by the authentication process (OAuth). Security code that identifies the user, their privileges and an application used in different requests from public sources to access protected resources. Its validity is determined by the expires_in parameter and is similar to APP_USR-1585551492-030918-25######3458-2880736, which is composed of
          enum:
            - Access token type -- APP_USR (application on behalf of a user), TEST (test, only valid in sandbox)
            - Client ID -- 1585551492
            - Creation date (MMddHH) -- 030918
            - Security hash -- 25######3458
            - User ID -- 2880736
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                site_id:
                  type: string
                  description: ID of the site where the test user will be created.
                  required: true
                  example: "MLA"
                  enum:
                    - MPE -- Mercado Libre Perú
                    - MLU -- Mercado Libre Uruguay
                    - MLA -- Mercado Libre Argentina
                    - MLC -- Mercado Libre Chile
                    - MCO -- Mercado Libre Colombia
                    - MLB -- Mercado Libre Brasil
                    - MLM -- Mercado Libre México
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                    example: 123
                    description: Unique ID that identifies the test user.
                  nickname:
                    type: string
                    example: "TEST45I5GYIH"
                    description: Nickname that identifies the test user.
                  password:
                    type: string
                    example: "qatest6730"
                    description: Test user password.
                  site_status:
                    type: string
                    example: "active"
                    description: Status of the site where the test user was created.
                  site_id:
                    type: string
                    example: "MLA"
                    description: ID of the site where the test user was created.
                  email:
                    type: string
                    example: "test_user_123@testuser.com"
                    description: Test user email.
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-02-01T12:00:00.000-04:00"
                    description: Test user creation date.
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-02-01T12:00:00.000-04:00"
                    description: Date of last record update.
        '400':
          description: Bad request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-Request--invalid-site_id
        '401':
          description: Not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401--Not-Found--invalid-token													
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 403--Forbidden--authorization-the-caller-id-must-be-a-productive-user
        '404':
          description: Resource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 404--Resource-Not-Found									 
        '500':
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500--Internal-Server-Error
  /test_user/search:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Search test user
      description: This endpoint handles http requests to search a test user
      parameters:
        - name: access_token
          in: query
          description: Access token generated from the seller by the authentication process (OAuth). Security code that identifies the user, their privileges and an application used in different requests from public sources to access protected resources. Its validity is determined by the expires_in parameter and is similar to APP_USR-1585551492-030918-25######3458-2880736, which is composed of
          enum:
            - Access token type -- APP_USR (application on behalf of a user), TEST (test, only valid in sandbox)
            - Client ID -- 1585551492
            - Creation date (MMddHH) -- 030918
            - Security hash -- 25######3458
            - User ID -- 2880736
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "12123adfasdf123u4u"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  total:
                    description: Total test users found.
                    type: integer
                    example: 1
                  results:
                    description: Localized test user information.
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: integer
                          description: Unique ID that identifies the test user.
                          example: 123
                        nickname:
                          type: string
                          description: Nickname that identifies the test user.
                          example: "TEST45I5GYIH"
                        site_status:
                          type: string
                          description: Status of the site where the test user was created.
                          example: "active"
                        site_id:
                          type: string
                          description: ID of the site where the test user was created.
                          example: "MLA"
                        email:
                          type: string
                          description: Test user email.
                          example: "test_user_123@testuser.com"
                        date_created:
                          type: string
                          description: Test user creation date.
                          example: "2021-11-04T12:02:35Z"
                        date_last_updated:
                          type: string
                          description: Date of last record update.
                          example: "2021-11-04T12:02:35Z"
        '401':
          description: Not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401--Not-Found--invalid-token									
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 403--Forbidden--authorization-the-caller.id-must-be-a-productive-user
        '404':
          description: Resource not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 404--Resource-Not-Found								
        '405':
          description: Method Not Allowed
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 405--Method-Not-Allowed
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500--Internal-Server-Error
  /test_user/{id}/password:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Update test user password
      description: This endpoint handles http requests to change the test user password
      parameters:
        - name: access_token
          in: query
          description: Access token generated from the seller by the authentication process (OAuth). Security code that identifies the user, their privileges and an application used in different requests from public sources to access protected resources. Its validity is determined by the expires_in parameter and is similar to APP_USR-1585551492-030918-25######3458-2880736, which is composed of
          enum:
            - Access token type -- APP_USR (application on behalf of a user), TEST (test, only valid in sandbox)
            - Client ID -- 1585551492
            - Creation date (MMddHH) -- 030918
            - Security hash -- 25######3458
            - User ID -- 2880736
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "12123adfasdf123u4u"
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the test user.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "12123adfasdf123u4u"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    description: Message with the password change status.
                    type: string
                    example: "password successfully reset"
                  new_password:
                    description: New test user password.
                    type: string
                    example: "random"
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 403--Forbidden--authorization-the-caller-id-must-be-a-productive-user403--Forbidden
        '405':
          description: Method Not Allowed
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 405--Method-Not-Allowed
        '500':
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500--Internal-Server-Error
  /test_user/{id}/account_money:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/subscriptions'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Add AM to test user account
      description: This endpoint handles http requests to add account_money to the test user account
      parameters:
        - name: access_token
          in: query
          description: Access token generated from the seller by the authentication process (OAuth). Security code that identifies the user, their privileges and an application used in different requests from public sources to access protected resources. Its validity is determined by the expires_in parameter and is similar to APP_USR-1585551492-030918-25######3458-2880736, which is composed of
          enum:
            - Access token type -- APP_USR (application on behalf of a user), TEST (test, only valid in sandbox)
            - Client ID -- 1585551492
            - Creation date (MMddHH) -- 030918
            - Security hash -- 25######3458
            - User ID -- 2880736
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "12123adfasdf123u4u"
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the test user.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "12123adfasdf123u4u"
      requestBody:
          description: Amount request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                required:
                  - site_id
                type: object
                properties:
                  amount:
                    description: Amount added to the test user account.
                    type: number
                    example: 1000.23
                    required: true
      responses:
        '204':
          description: No content
        '400':
          description: Bad request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-Request--invalid-amount
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 403--Forbidden--authorization-the-caller-id-must-be-a-productive-user
        '405':
          description: Method not allowed
        '500':
          description: Internal server error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 500--Internal-Server-Error

Error: unmarshal: callback: json: cannot unmarshal bool into Go struct field Schema.required of type []string
